"Successive Practice: Harkotan":
"This mission is part of a battle exercise.
By competing for the best time, we
expect ARKS to reach further heights.
Compete for the best time to subdue all
enemies. In order to obtain the best time,
we recommend forming a party first.
[Notes]
Items/EXP cannot be obtained.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."
